org.grouplens.lenskit.data.dao

Interface ItemEventDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BinaryRatingDAO, JDBCRatingDAO, PrefetchingItemEventDAO, RatingSnapshotDAO

    @DefaultImplementation(value=PrefetchingItemEventDAO.class)
public interface ItemEventDAO

    DAO to retrieve events by item.

    Since:
    1.3

    • Method Summary

      Methods

      List<Event> getEventsForItem(long item)
      Get the events for a specific item.

    • Method Detail

      • streamEventsByItem

        Cursor<ItemEventCollection<Event>> streamEventsByItem()

        Stream events grouped by item.

        Returns:
        A cursor iterating over the events from all items. If an item exists but does not have any events, it may or may not be included depending on the DAO implementation.

      • streamEventsByItem

        <E extends Event> Cursor<ItemEventCollection<E>> streamEventsByItem(Class<E> type)

        Stream events grouped by item.

        Parameters:
        type - The type of item to look for.
        Returns:
        A cursor iterating over the events of type type from all items. If an item exists but does not have any events, it may or may not be included depending on the DAO implementation.

      • getEventsForItem

        List<Event> getEventsForItem(long item)

        Get the events for a specific item.

        Parameters:
        item - The item ID.
        Returns:
        The item’s history, or null if the item is unknown.

      • getEventsForItem

        @Nullable
<E extends Event> List<E> getEventsForItem(long item,
                                                  Class<E> type)

        Get the events for a specific item, filtering by type.

        Parameters:
        item - The item ID.
        type - The type of events to retrieve.
        Returns:
        The item’s history, or null if the item is unknown.

      • getUsersForItem

        @Nullable
LongSet getUsersForItem(long item)

        Get the users who have interacted with an item.

        Parameters:
        item - The item ID.
        Returns:
        The set of users who have interacted with this item, or null if the item is unknown.
